alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Southern Jasper (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hardin and southeastern Jasper Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evadale, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Silsbee, Buna and Evadale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
